meta.name: Automate Airlines Customer Support with GPT-4 and Question Classification

nodes.name: Webhook - User Question
nodes.notes: Receives user questions from chat interface (web, mobile, messaging apps)

parameters.content:
## üì• ENTRY POINT
Receives travel questions from users

nodes.name: Extract & Clean Question
nodes.notes: Parses webhook payload and extracts user question with metadata

parameters.content:
## üîç DATA EXTRACTION
Cleans and structures incoming question

nodes.name: Classify Question Category
nodes.notes: Uses AI to categorize the question type for better response handling

parameters.name: messages
parameters.value: =[{"role": "system", "content": "You are a travel question classifier. Classify the following travel question into ONE of these categories: DESTINATIONS, PACKAGES, VISA, TRANSPORT, HOTELS, ACTIVITIES, BOOKING, CANCELLATION, BAGGAGE, GENERAL. Respond with only the category name in uppercase."}, {"role": "user", "content": "{{ $json.userQuestion }}"}]

parameters.content:
## üè∑Ô∏è CATEGORIZATION
Classifies question into travel categories

nodes.name: Parse Category Result
nodes.notes: Extracts and stores the detected question category

parameters.content:
## üìã CATEGORY PARSING
Stores question category for routing

nodes.name: Fetch Knowledge Base Context
nodes.notes: Retrieves relevant information from knowledge base based on category

parameters.content:
## üìö KNOWLEDGE BASE
Fetches relevant travel information

nodes.name: Generate AI Answer
nodes.notes: Uses GPT-4 to generate accurate, contextual answer to user's question

parameters.name: messages
parameters.value:
=[{"role": "system", "content": "You are a helpful and friendly airlines travel assistant. Answer travel questions accurately based on the provided context. Be concise but informative. Use a warm, professional tone. If you don't have specific information, provide general guidance and suggest contacting customer support for details. Always prioritize customer satisfaction and safety.

Context Information:
{{ $json.knowledgeContext }}"}, {"role": "user", "content": "{{ $json.userQuestion }}"}]

## üìù RESPONSE FORMATTING

nodes.name: Check User Satisfaction
nodes.notes: Detects positive feedback or satisfaction indicators in user response

parameters.content:

Detects if user is satisfied with answer

nodes.notes: Records satisfied user interaction for analytics

parameters.content:
## üòä SATISFIED PATH
User is happy with the response

nodes.name: Offer Human Support
nodes.notes: Offers human agent support if user seems unsatisfied or needs more help

## üîÄ PATH MERGE

## üì§ RESPONSE DELIVERY
Sends answer back to user interface

## ‚úàÔ∏è AIRLINES FAQ BOT

**Intelligent Travel Assistant**

**Categories Handled:**
‚Ä¢ Destinations & Travel Info
‚Ä¢ Package Deals & Offers  
‚Ä¢ Visa Requirements
‚Ä¢ Transportation Options
‚Ä¢ Hotel Bookings
‚Ä¢ Activities & Tours
‚Ä¢ Booking Management
‚Ä¢ Cancellations & Refunds
‚Ä¢ Baggage Policies
‚Ä¢ General Inquiries

**Features:**
‚úì AI-powered responses
‚úì Context-aware answers
‚úì Category classification
‚úì Quick links & resources
‚úì Satisfaction tracking
‚úì Human support escalation
‚úì Conversation logging

**Setup Required:**
1. Add OpenAI API key
2. Configure database endpoint
3. Customize knowledge base
4. Test webhook URL
5. Connect to chat interface
